title: Flag Day and National Flag Week, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, declaring June 14, 2025, as Flag Day and the week starting June 8, 2025, as National Flag Week. It commemorates the adoption of the American flag on June 14, 1777, emphasizing its significance as a symbol of freedom, unity, and patriotism throughout American history. The proclamation calls for the display of the flag on all Federal Government buildings and encourages citizens to participate in observances honoring the flag and celebrating American heritage through public gatherings and reciting the Pledge of Allegiance. The proclamation underscores the enduring spirit of the flag and its role in representing the nation's values and history over nearly 250 years.
